snippet: The new rules proposed by Gov. John W. Hickenlooper, a Democrat, would exceed existing federal regulations on emissions of methane and other gases from well sites.
abstract: Colorado Gov John W Hickenlooper proposes tough new limits on leaks of methane and other greenhouse gases from well sights and storage tanks; new rules are a largely aimed at limiting pollution from hydraulic fracturing, though they would also cover traditional petroleum and gas exploration and production.
lead_paragraph: The new rules proposed by Gov. John W. Hickenlooper, a Democrat, would exceed existing federal regulations on emissions of methane and other gases from well sites.

headline.main: Colorado Governor Proposes Strict Limits on Greenhouse Gas Leaks From Drilling
headline.print_headline: Colorado Governor Proposes Strict Limits on Greenhouse Gas Leaks From Drilling
